DIALOG_CLIP_2.TEXT:
Gate to the Otherworld,
unleash your power!

DIALOG_CLIP_3.TEXT:
Zethia,
now it's up to you!

DIALOG_CLIP_4.TEXT:
Alas... I think you’re
still too strong for me.

DIALOG_CLIP_15.TEXT:
O Earth, trap enemies
in your embrace!

DIALOG_CLIP_18.TEXT:
I pledge,
in the name of the first...

DIALOG_CLIP_19.TEXT:
O deepest darkness, you are blanket
covering heavens and enfolding earth.

DIALOG_CLIP_20.TEXT:
My life shall amount
to world's creation!

DIALOG_CLIP_29.TEXT:
I can definitely
learn stuff from you!

DIALOG_CLIP_16.TEXT:
I pledge,
in the name of the first...

DIALOG_CLIP_17.TEXT:
O ferocious flame,piercer of
catastrophe and shield from corruption.

DIALOG_CLIP_18.TEXT:
My life shall amount
to world's creation!

DIALOG_CLIP_20.TEXT:
Let this move
settle the outcome!

DIALOG_CLIP_22.TEXT:
This is the move that
Blazewolf taught me!

DIALOG_CLIP_1.TEXT:
I will not fall!
Let's go!

Here and now—
I call upon the great light!

DIALOG_CLIP_2.TEXT: By the power of the Auspex!

DIALOG_CLIP_3.TEXT:
Holy mana,
guide me to victory!

DIALOG_CLIP_4.TEXT: Let us deliver the decisive blow!

DIALOG_CLIP_5.TEXT: You do honor to your name!

DIALOG_CLIP_2.TEXT:
The wind speaks its memory.
It speaks of courage and loyalty!

DIALOG_CLIP_4.TEXT:
I never thought you might push
me this far, but I won't lose!

DIALOG_CLIP_5.TEXT:
Cut through your enemies,
O surging tempest!

DIALOG_CLIP_7.TEXT:
The wind will lead to the
creation of hope!

DIALOG_CLIP_10011.TEXT:
Ooh, you have to make the enemy’s
Scorching Energy level lower than yours!

DIALOG_CLIP_10012.TEXT:
A powerful attack is coming!
Be careful!

DIALOG_CLIP_10014.TEXT:
Ooh, you have to make the enemy’s
Scorching Energy level higher than yours!

DIALOG_CLIP_10015.TEXT:
A powerful attack is coming!
Be careful!

DIALOG_CLIP_10017.TEXT:
Changing Scorching Energy level via those
burning areas will get harder each time…!

DIALOG_CLIP_10018.TEXT:
Yikes! Jump to the highest point now!
Moving from top to bottom is safer!

DIALOG_CLIP_10019.TEXT: If the burning zones are connected...!

DIALOG_CLIP_10021.TEXT:
It seems that touching the light pillars from
the sanctuary will grant powerful buffs!

DIALOG_CLIP_10022.TEXT: But if you get too many buffs at the same \ntime, it will have the opposite effect…!

DIALOG_CLIP_10023.TEXT:
Remember the order of the falling stars!
They'll unleash powerful guardian forces ONE by ONE !

DIALOG_CLIP_10024.TEXT:
Wow! Powerful attacks is coming!
Which star will release its power first...?

DIALOG_CLIP_10025.TEXT:
We have to tough it out to survive this
attack...! With the buff from the sanctuary!

DIALOG_CLIP_90011.TEXT:
Welcome to the training mode!
Here you can practice your combat skills!

DIALOG_CLIP_90012.TEXT: If you forgot how to control, there are instructions in the lower right corner of the screen!

DIALOG_CLIP_90013.TEXT: If you want to quit, you can press Esc or click the menu button to exit!
